data.name: Horror Zombies Mixed Reality
data.description:
Immerse yourself in the captivating world of "Horror Zombies Mixed Reality" and get ready for an unforgettable experience! 

THEY ARE HERE!
Arm with multiple weapons, including knives, your pistol and a trusty crowbar, as you engage in pulse-pounding battles against the undead.

MIXED REALITY
Dive headfirst into the experience with the innovative Mixed Reality mode, leveraging the cutting-edge passthrough technology of the Meta Quest VR headset, as you fend off zombies in YOUR own home. 

HIGHLIGHTS
* A captivating Mixed Reality world for an unforgettable experience.
* Battle against zombies using multiple weapons.
* Improve your skills at the tryout.
* Multiple accessibility options.

-> More content coming soon!

changelog.change_log:
Thank you immensely for your feedback! 
We're thrilled to unveil the latest enhancements to the game:

- Expanded Arsenal: Introducing 2 new weapons - Rifle and Shotgun.
- Balanced Ammunition: Improved ammo balance for optimized gameplay.
- Dynamic Soundtrack: All-new, adrenaline-pumping soundtrack.
- Meta Space Map: Introducing Meta mapping for Quest 2 & Pro (v60+).
- Enhanced Visuals: Graphics and object upgrades.
- Refinements and Fixes: Minor adjustments and bug fixes.
